title: Password request is not shown in Console for auto tests on SauceLabs

milestone.description: Finalize Wallet, introduce updated Discover, Network Switching, and MVP of Push Notifications

body:
### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug

[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)
*Summary*: 
Password request is not shown in Console for 90% of test runs
On other devices/emulators the issue reproduces once per ten attempts



![password request](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6584810/25577392/f153e9ea-2e65-11e7-8bab-b5c93862e5c1.png)

#### Expected behavior
password request is shown in Console
#### Actual behavior
password request is not shown in Console
### Reproduction
- For now there is no other reproduction scenario,  except running tests agains apk in SauceLabs. However all failed tests have common error message in logcat  

```
10-08 23:42:34.801  3503  3618 D StatusModule: Geth node started
10-08 23:42:34.802  3503  3618 D ServiceConnector: Sending message to service: 
10-08 23:42:34.813  3503  3545 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:22] - Handling re-frame event:  :set-chat-ui-props
10-08 23:42:34.828  3503  3545 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.utils.handlers:22] - Handling re-frame event:  :set-layout-height
10-08 23:42:34.847  3503  3542 D StatusService: Signal event: {"type":"node.started","event":{}}
10-08 23:42:34.847  3503  3542 D StatusService: before sendReply false
10-08 23:42:34.848  3503  3542 E StatusService: Exception sending message id: 0
10-08 23:42:34.848  3503  3542 E StatusService: java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to invoke virtual method 'void android.os.Messenger.send(android.os.Message)' on a null object reference
10-08 23:42:34.848  3503  3542 E StatusService: 	at im.status.ethereum.module.StatusService.sendReply(StatusService.java:92)
10-08 23:42:34.848  3503  3542 E StatusService: 	at im.status.ethereum.module.StatusService.signalEvent(StatusService.java:59)
10-08 23:42:34.856  3503  3555 D StatusService: Signal event: {"type":"node.ready","event":{}}
10-08 23:42:34.856  3503  3555 D StatusService: before sendReply false
10-08 23:42:34.856  3503  3555 E StatusService: Exception sending message id: 0
10-08 23:42:34.856  3503  3555 E StatusService: java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to invoke virtual method 'void android.os.Messenger.send(android.os.Message)' on a null object reference
10-08 23:42:34.856  3503  3555 E StatusService: 	at im.status.ethereum.module.StatusService.sendReply(StatusService.java:92)
10-08 23:42:34.856  3503  3555 E StatusService: 	at im.status.ethereum.module.StatusService.signalEvent(StatusService.java:59)
```

### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Android or iOS.)
* Operating System: Android emulator on Sauce Labs
